Html:
Hi,

I try to load a simple textfile (csv) via HtmlWeb.Load method using UNC uri format like "\\myServer\myPath\MyDocument.csv"

Unfortunatly, somebody opened the file with MS Excel, so I get a System.IO.IOException ﻿﻿"The process cannot access the file because it is used by another process". So why that? HtmlWeb shouldn't care if the file is used, since the access should be read-only.

 

Any ideas?
